mapper.select: select channel_code from physical_channel_binding where physical_id=#{physicalId} and channel_type_id is null and collect_id is null
mapper.update: update physical_channel_binding set channel_type_id=null where channel_type_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into channel_parameter(id,`type`,frequency,duration,accuracy,`interval`,`name`,enterprise_id) values (#{id},#{type},#{frequency},#{duration},#{accuracy},#{interval},#{name},#{enterprise_id}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `type`=#{type},frequency=#{frequency},duration=#{duration},accuracy=#{accuracy},`interval`=#{interval}, `name`=#{name},enterprise_id=#{enterprise_id}
mapper.select: select (select `name` from physical where id=physical_id) as physical_name, group_concat(channel_code) as codes,physical_id from physical_channel_binding where channel_type_id=#{id} GROUP BY physical_id
select a.* from (select distinct channel_type_id from physical_channel_binding where physical_id=#{id} and channel_type_id is not null) b inner join physical a on a.id=b.channel_type_id
